# UploadFileRequest.Purpose property

The intended purpose of the uploaded documents. Use "fine-tune" for Fine-tuning.This allows us to validate the format of the uploaded file. Currently the only supported purpose is "fine-tune".

```csharp
public string Purpose { get; }
```

## Remarks

https://beta.openai.com/docs/api-reference/files/upload#files/upload-purpose
